member.name: T:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest
member.summary: For request coming in from API Gateway proxy http://docs.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/latest/developerguide/api-gateway-set-up-simple-proxy.html

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.Resource
member.summary:
The resource path defined in API Gateway
This field is only set for REST API requests.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.Path
member.summary:
The url path for the caller
This field is only set for REST API requests.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.HttpMethod
member.summary:
The HTTP method used
This field is only set for REST API requests.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.Headers
member.summary:
The headers sent with the request. This collection will only contain a single value for a header.
API Gateway will populate both the Headers and MultiValueHeaders collection for every request. If multiple values are set for a header then the Headers collection will just contain the last value.
This field is only set for REST API requests.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.MultiValueHeaders
member.summary:
The headers sent with the request. This collection supports multiple values for a single header.
API Gateway will populate both the Headers and MultiValueHeaders collection for every request. If multiple values are set for a header then the Headers collection will just contain the last value.
This field is only set for REST API requests.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.QueryStringParameters
member.summary:
The query string parameters that were part of the request. This collection will only contain a single value for a query parameter.
API Gateway will populate both the QueryStringParameters and MultiValueQueryStringParameters collection for every request. If multiple values are set for a query parameter then the QueryStringParameters collection will just contain the last value.
This field is only set for REST API requests.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.MultiValueQueryStringParameters
member.summary:
The query string parameters that were part of the request. This collection supports multiple values for a single query parameter.
API Gateway will populate both the QueryStringParameters and MultiValueQueryStringParameters collection for every request. If multiple values are set for a query parameter then the QueryStringParameters collection will just contain the last value.
This field is only set for REST API requests.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.PathParameters
member.summary:
The path parameters that were part of the request
This field is only set for REST API requests.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.StageVariables
member.summary: The stage variables defined for the stage in API Gateway

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.RequestContext
member.summary: The request context for the request

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.Body
member.summary: The HTTP request body.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.IsBase64Encoded
member.summary: True if the body of the request is base 64 encoded.

member.name: T:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.ProxyRequestContext
member.summary: The ProxyRequestContext contains the information to identify the AWS account and resources invoking the Lambda function. It also includes Cognito identity information for the caller.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.ProxyRequestContext.Path
member.summary:
The resource full path including the API Gateway stage
This field is only set for REST API requests.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.ProxyRequestContext.AccountId
member.summary: The account id that owns the executing Lambda function

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.ProxyRequestContext.ResourceId
member.summary: The resource id.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.ProxyRequestContext.Stage
member.summary: The API Gateway stage name

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.ProxyRequestContext.RequestId
member.summary: The unique request id

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.ProxyRequestContext.Identity
member.summary: The identity information for the request caller

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.ProxyRequestContext.ResourcePath
member.summary:
The resource path defined in API Gateway
This field is only set for REST API requests.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.ProxyRequestContext.HttpMethod
member.summary:
The HTTP method used
This field is only set for REST API requests.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.ProxyRequestContext.ApiId
member.summary: The API Gateway rest API Id.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.ProxyRequestContext.ExtendedRequestId
member.summary: An automatically generated ID for the API call, which contains more useful information for debugging/troubleshooting.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.ProxyRequestContext.ConnectionId
member.summary:
The connectionId identifies a unique client connection in a WebSocket API.
This field is only set for WebSocket API requests.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.ProxyRequestContext.ConnectionAt
member.summary:
The Epoch-formatted connection time in a WebSocket API.
This field is only set for WebSocket API requests.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.ProxyRequestContext.DomainName
member.summary:
A domain name for the WebSocket API. This can be used to make a callback to the client (instead of a hard-coded value).
This field is only set for WebSocket API requests.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.ProxyRequestContext.EventType
member.summary:
The event type: CONNECT, MESSAGE, or DISCONNECT.
This field is only set for WebSocket API requests.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.ProxyRequestContext.MessageId
member.summary:
A unique server-side ID for a message. Available only when the $context.eventType is MESSAGE.
This field is only set for WebSocket API requests.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.ProxyRequestContext.RouteKey
member.summary:
The selected route key.
This field is only set for WebSocket API requests.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.ProxyRequestContext.Authorizer
member.summary: The APIGatewayCustomAuthorizerContext containing the custom properties set by a custom authorizer.

member.name: T:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.RequestIdentity
member.summary: The RequestIdentity contains identity information for the request caller.

member.summary: The Cognito identity pool id.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.RequestIdentity.AccountId
member.summary: The account id of the caller.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.RequestIdentity.CognitoIdentityId
member.summary: The cognito identity id.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.RequestIdentity.Caller
member.summary: The caller

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.RequestIdentity.ApiKey
member.summary: The API Key

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.RequestIdentity.SourceIp
member.summary: The source IP of the request

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.RequestIdentity.CognitoAuthenticationType
member.summary: The Cognito authentication type used for authentication

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.RequestIdentity.CognitoAuthenticationProvider
member.summary: The Cognito authentication provider

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.RequestIdentity.UserArn
member.summary: The user arn

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.RequestIdentity.UserAgent
member.summary: The user agent

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyRequest.RequestIdentity.User
member.summary: The user

member.name: T:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyResponse
member.summary: The response object for Lambda functions handling request from API Gateway proxy http://docs.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/latest/developerguide/api-gateway-set-up-simple-proxy.html

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyResponse.StatusCode
member.summary: The HTTP status code for the request

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyResponse.Headers
member.summary: The Http headers return in the response. This collection supports setting single value for the same headers. If both the Headers and MultiValueHeaders collections are set API Gateway will merge the collection before returning back the headers to the caller.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyResponse.MultiValueHeaders
member.summary: The Http headers return in the response. This collection supports setting multiple values for the same headers. If both the Headers and MultiValueHeaders collections are set API Gateway will merge the collection before returning back the headers to the caller.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyResponse.Body
member.summary: The response body

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.APIGatewayEvents.APIGatewayProxyResponse.IsBase64Encoded
member.summary: Flag indicating whether the body should be treated as a base64-encoded string
